title: Unilever threatens online ad cuts to clean up internet
text:
Unilever threatens online ad cuts to clean up internet Monday, February 12, 2018 - 01:02 
Consumer goods giant Unilever, one of the world's biggest advertisers, has threatened to pull investment from digital platforms such as Facebook and Google that ''create division'' in society or fail to protect children. Laura Frykberg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Consumer goods giant Unilever, one of the world's biggest advertisers, has threatened to pull investment from digital platforms such as Facebook and Google that "create division" in society or fail to protect children. Laura Frykberg reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2spzZ4D
